1.content: You Were walking home from school/work when you were walking home you notice it started getting foggy. It was so dense you couldn't even see whats Infront of you. after some wandering around the fog begins clear and you find yourself In
1.title: The Start of your Adventure

11.content:
Where am I you Said,you realized you were in the Power Plant In The Kanto Region
Great could this get any weirder you Said as you stumbled upon a machine that looked like two pods connected by a tube, with a sign saying TOP SECRET BODY SWAPPING MACHINE,DO NOT TOUCH
Pokémon world and a body swapping machine,sounds like the making of a bad story you Said rolling your eyes
You stepped in one of the pods thinking you could turn the machine into something to take you home to your own dimension
Just then you heard a Female voice approaching the machine as you hid in the machine
Who was the Girl that discovered the machine next?
11.title: The Kanto Region

choices: She sends one of her caught Pokemon in
It wasn't Jessie but a wild Pokemon heads in
111.content: Jessie James and Meowth were blasting off again...stopped by ash and his pokemon it feels like they always get beasted so they decide to go and find a strong pokemon. Finding no luck Jessie James and Meowth decide to split up there efforts maybe they decide to go there separate ways. Jessie happens to find this strange place curious she went in to inspect it and found the machine we were working on it says its a body-swapping machine. but does he head-on in?
111.title: Jessie

152.content: Where exactly are you in the Kalos Region?
152.title: The Kalos Region

1522.content: As you are walking you see a girl walk by you, yell out the words um excuse me, the girl turned around its?
1522.title: Vaniville Town

choices: She looks at you weirdly, yes.
15221.content: You say Hi. Are you Serena?
15221.title: Serena

info.brief_description: This is a Pokemon TF Interactive where you get to decide what happens next
info.description:
You were Walking around the forest to find your not at home anymore but in the pokemon world

Please Message me If you have any ideas or if you want to help me continue
